songs.title: Ghost
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I know that you've heard it all
But the tall ghost didn't see-e
The lights on the TV screen
You've gotta rely on speaking

[Chorus 1]
'Cause all we know
Is all we know
Is we don't wanna go
We don't wanna go-oh
And when we were told, oh
We don't wanna know
We don't wanna

[Verse 2]
And the words on the last page
Yeah, they were phrased ri-ight
A worth the wait
You gotta rely on si-i-ight

[Chorus 1]
'Cause all we know
Is all we know
Is we don't wanna go
We don't wanna go-oh
And when we were told, oh
We don't wanna know
We don't wanna

[Bridge]
Oh-oh
Oh, oh-oh
Ooh, ooh
No, we don't wanna know
We don't, ah-ah-ah, ah
No, we don't wanna know
We dont, ah-ah-ah, ah
Ooh-ooh-ooh

[Chorus 2]
'Cause all we know
Is all we know
Is we don't wanna go
We don't wanna go-oh
And when we were told, oh
We don't wanna know
We don't wanna know-oh

[Chorus 2]
'Cause all we know
Is all we know
Is we don't wanna go
We don't wanna go-oh
And when we were told, oh
We don't wanna know
We don't wanna know-oh

[Outro]
We don't wanna know-oh
